thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: Cory Ann
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Cory Ann

author: Cory Ann
title: Cory Ann
text: After many perfect orders I had a frame arrive damaged and I sent an email to customer service with a photo. Within a few hours, I had an email response and a shipping confirmation that a replacement was on its way. Fabulous customer service!
